reviewText: Great job visually and cueing.  Would suggest showing modifications but still a great dvd. Would recommend this to yoga and martial arts students
Title: Budokon: Strength and Balance Yoga

reviewText: You have to try this Budokon stuff...took a class, tried it, now love it.  Can't get enough.  Much more fun and active than Yoga.  It's like Billy Blanks doing yoga, very cool stuff.
Title: Budokon: Strength and Balance Yoga

reviewText: yeaaaaaaaaaaaa.  this is great.  more intense than regular yoga.  will build strength and balance.  wish i had this when i was playing ball it would of helped better than straight lifting and running
Title: Budokon: Strength and Balance Yoga

reviewText: I could open my own exercise library with all of the DVDs I own but I think this is my favorite one of all.  It flows extremely well from beginning to end and the moves are like nothing I've ever done before. I think Cameron Shane is an excellent teacher and the tutorials are so helpful.  I love the way I feel while I'm doing this workout and by the end of it I know I've burned a ton of calories.  I highly recommend this DVD if you are looking for something original, challenging, and fun.
Title: Budokon: Strength and Balance Yoga

reviewText: i agree with the other review...awesome. i took a class too and i'm hooked. it's amazing...get it!
Title: Budokon: Strength and Balance Yoga
